summary: This appears to be an email header regarding a request for a laptop for MDC (likely Metropolitan Detention Center), sent on October 28, 2020. The email is part of the Epstein case document release and relates to logistical or administrative matters concerning detention facilities.

events.title: Email regarding laptop for MDC
events.description: An email was sent concerning a laptop for MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center), indicating administrative or logistical coordination related to detention facilities.

keyFacts: The document is an email header dated October 28, 2020.
The subject of the email is 'RE: laptop for MDC', suggesting a request or discussion about providing a laptop to the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The email is part of the Epstein case document release, indicating it may relate to administrative matters during legal proceedings or detention.
